scripts.cli:chat:local: npm run build && node lib/cli/chat.js http://localhost:8081
scripts.build:chat:local: npm run build && cd ../chat && npm run config:local && npm run build
scripts.build:chat:dev: npm run build && cd ../chat && npm run config:dev && npm run build
scripts.build:chat:prod: npm run build && cd ../chat && npm run config:prod && npm run build
scripts.deploy:chat:local: npm run build:chat:local && cd ../chat && node lib/index.js
scripts.deploy:chat:dev: npm run build:chat:dev && node lib/deploy/chat.js -p dev
scripts.deploy:chat:prod: npm run build:chat:prod && node lib/deploy/chat.js -p prod
scripts.cli:chroma:local: npm run build && node lib/cli/chroma.js http://localhost:8081
scripts.build:chroma:local: npm run build && cd ../chroma && npm run config:local && npm run build
scripts.build:chroma:dev: npm run build && cd ../chroma && npm run config:dev && npm run build
scripts.build:chroma:prod: npm run build && cd ../chroma && npm run config:prod && npm run build
scripts.deploy:chroma:local: npm run build:chroma:local && cd ../chroma && node lib/index.js
scripts.deploy:chroma:dev: npm run build:chroma:dev && node lib/deploy/chroma.js -p dev
scripts.deploy:chroma:prod: npm run build:chroma:prod && node lib/deploy/chroma.js -p prod
scripts.cli:hysu-crawler:local: npm run build && node lib/cli/hysu-crawler.js http://localhost:8082
scripts.test:hysu-crawler:local: npm run build && PHASE=local DRIVER_PORT=8082 ./node_modules/.bin/jest --verbose lib/test/hysu-crawler.test.js
scripts.build:hysu-crawler:local: npm run build && cd ../hysu-crawler && npm run build
scripts.build:hysu-crawler:dev: npm run build && cd ../hysu-crawler npm run build
scripts.build:hysu-crawler:prod: npm run build && cd ../hysu-crawler && npm run build
scripts.deploy:hysu-crawler:local: npm run build:hysu-crawler:local && cd ../hysu-crawler && PHASE=local DRIVER_PORT=8082 node lib/index.js
scripts.deploy:hysu-crawler:dev: npm run build:hysu-crawler:dev && PHASE=dev node lib/deploy/hysu-crawler.js -p dev
scripts.deploy:hysu-crawler:prod: npm run build:hysu-crawler:prod && PHASE=prod node lib/deploy/hysu-crawler.js -p prod

scripts.build:like:dev: npm run build && cd ../like && npm run config:dev && npm run build
scripts.build:like:prod: npm run build && cd ../like && npm run config:prod && npm run build

scripts.deploy:like:dev: npm run build:like:dev && node lib/deploy/like.js -p dev
scripts.deploy:like:prod: npm run build:like:prod && node lib/deploy/like.js -p prod

scripts.build:error-report:dev: npm run build && cd ../error-report && npm run config:dev && npm run build
scripts.build:error-report:prod: npm run build && cd ../error-report && npm run config:prod && npm run build

scripts.deploy:error-report:prod: npm run build:error-report:prod && node lib/deploy/error-report.js -p prod
scripts.cli:textify:local: npm run build && node lib/cli/textify.js http://localhost:8085

scripts.build:textify:dev: npm run build && cd ../textify npm run build
scripts.build:textify:prod: npm run build && cd ../textify && npm run build
scripts.deploy:textify:local: npm run build:textify:local && cd ../textify && PHASE=local DRIVER_PORT=8085 node lib/index.js
scripts.deploy:textify:dev: npm run build:textify:dev && PHASE=dev node lib/deploy/textify.js -p dev
scripts.deploy:textify:prod: npm run build:textify:prod && PHASE=prod node lib/deploy/textify.js -p prod
